body:
cc @ShreyaR 

Thanks for reporting @smiralr. The GPU support for PyTorch on master is still a work in progress, and will be fixed by #1508. In the meantime, if you want to use something more stable, the `tf-legacy` branch (`ludwigai/ludwig-gpu:tf-legacy` docker) should work as expected (though it uses tensorflow).

Still facing the same issue for ludwigai/ludwig-gpu:master
DIGEST:sha256:28cb0c32af7f2bbab6b6f008626ae17259c31753c5e93babe0f9ee337d53b5f2

                    'validation_metric': 'loss'}}
